about_the_game:
A seemingly floating stone staircase leads down to a room surrounded by basalt blocks, with circle of magical runes at its center. To the left is a messy library which seems to have experienced an earthquake, with most of the books lying on the floor, and the tables lined up in a strange mess. In the other direction there is an observatory. In the middle, a scaled-down magical replica of the solar system floats and rotates, at the end, a colossal telescope spies the sky; who knows looking for what.

This DLC contains 3 battlemaps to help you to bring your TTRPG session to the next level

A seemingly floating stone staircase leads down to a room surrounded by basalt blocks, with circle of magical runes at its center. To the left is a messy library which seems to have experienced an earthquake, with most of the books lying on the floor, and the tables lined up in a strange mess. In the other direction there is an observatory. In the middle, a scaled-down magical replica of the solar system floats and rotates, at the end, a colossal telescope spies the sky; who knows looking for what.

This DLC contains 3 battlemaps to help you to bring your TTRPG session to the next level
name: RPGScenery - Wizard Cave Scene

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
  • OS *: Windows 7/8.1/10
  • Processor: Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
  • Graphics: Nvidia GeForce GTX 950 or Equivalent
pc_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
